DOC.brief_summary: To analyse and describe sinus microbiota, during hard to treat (or refractory) rhinosinusitis, using culturomic and metagenomic methods (i.e. to culture on many different medium of culture to grow hard to cultivate bacteria + to sequence and analyse all DNA contained in samples). Samples are middle meatus swabs or pus aspiration, done during usually patient following.
DOC.criteria: >18 year old chronic refractory rhinosinusitis to require middle meatus swab or other sinus sample absence of opposition <18 year old pregnant women breastfeeding under trusteeship under guardianship
